Class.name: TK.Zen.LogicalAddresses
Class.Description: Created using the page template: Default

Parameter.name: CURRENTMENUITEM
Parameter.Description: Id of the menu item that should be current when displaying this page

Parameter.name: TABLEPANES
Parameter.Description: List of table pane ids to apply preferences to

Query.name: LogicalAddressesView
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT a.Id, a.FromTidpunkt, a.TomTidpunkt, a.Version, l.HsaId LogiskAdressat, r.Namn RivVersion, cm.HsaId Tjansteproducentid, ct.Namnrymd Tjanstekontrakt FROM TK.Logiskadress a INNER JOIN TK.RivVersion r ON a.RivVersion_id = r.Id INNER JOIN TK.Logiskadressat l ON a.LogiskAdressat_id = l.id INNER JOIN TK.Tjanstekomponent cm ON a.Tjansteproducent_id = cm.Id INNER JOIN TK.Tjanstekontrakt ct ON a.Tjanstekontrakt_id = ct.Id

Method.name: tableSetup
Method.Implementation:
Set pTable.orderByClause = "LogiskAdressat" Set tCols($Increment(tCols))="|header="_$$$Text("ID")_"|width=5%|colName=Id|filterType=text" Set tCols($Increment(tCols))="|header="_$$$Text("Adressat")_"|width=25%|colName=LogiskAdressat|filterType=text" //Tillägg för namnrymd/tjänstekontrakt Set tCols($Increment(tCols))="|header="_$$$Text("Tjänstekontrakt")_"|width=40%|colName=Tjanstekontrakt|filterType=text" Set tCols($Increment(tCols))="|header="_$$$Text("Riv Version")_"|width=10%|colName=RivVersion|filterType=text" Set tCols($Increment(tCols))="|header="_$$$Text("Version")_"|width=10%|colName=Version|filterType=text" Set tCols($Increment(tCols))="|header=|width=10%|linkCaption="_$$$Text("Open")_"|cellTitle="_$$$Text("Open this RIV-TA profile for viewing and editing")_"|link=javascript:zenPage.viewSoftware('#(%query.Id)#');"
For i=1:1:tCols { Set tColumn = ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.column).%New() Do ..setPropertySet(tColumn, tCols(i)) Do pTable.columns.Insert(tColumn) Do %page.%AddComponent(tColumn) }

XData.name: FormContent
XData.Data: <pane xmlns:c="http://www.intersystems.com/zen/custom"> <hgroup> <text id="id" label="ID:" size="2" readOnly="true" controlClass="textro" /> </hgroup> <hgroup> <dateText id="datefrom" label="Date from"/> <dateText id="dateto" label="Date to"/> </hgroup> <c:addressee id="addressee" label="Addressee" size="64" title="Define packages as a comma separated list of beginnings of package names"/> <c:rivVersion id="rivversion" label="Riv Version" size="64" title="Define packages as a comma separated list of beginnings of package names"/> <c:tjansteKontrakt id="tjanstekontrakt" label="Contract" size="64" title="Define packages as a comma separated list of beginnings of package names"/> <c:tjansteKomponent id="tjansteproducent" label="Component" size="64" title="Define packages as a comma separated list of beginnings of package names"/> <text id="version" label="Version" size="8" /> </pane>

Method.name: toView
Method.Implementation: Do pPage.%SetValueById("id", pModel.Id) Do pPage.%SetValueById("datefrom", $ZD(pModel.FromTidpunkt,3)) Do pPage.%SetValueById("dateto", $ZD(pModel.TomTidpunkt,3)) Do pPage.%SetValueById("addressee", pModel.LogiskAdressatid) Do pPage.%SetValueById("rivversion", pModel.RivVersionid) Do pPage.%SetValueById("tjanstekontrakt", pModel.Tjanstekontraktid) Do pPage.%SetValueById("tjansteproducent", pModel.Tjansteproducentid) Do pPage.%SetValueById("version", pModel.Version)

Method.name: toModel
Method.Implementation: Set:pPage.%GetValueById("id")="" pModel.Id = 0 Set pModel.FromTidpunkt = $ZDH(pPage.%GetValueById("datefrom"),3) Set pModel.TomTidpunkt = $ZDH(pPage.%GetValueById("dateto"),3) Set pModel.LogiskAdressatid = pPage.%GetValueById("addressee") Set pModel.RivVersionid = pPage.%GetValueById("rivversion") Set pModel.Tjanstekontraktid = pPage.%GetValueById("tjanstekontrakt") Set pModel.Tjansteproducentid = pPage.%GetValueById("tjansteproducent") Set pModel.Version = pPage.%GetValueById("version")
